snippet: Employers added 151,000 jobs in January, a sharp slowdown. Technology stocks fell hard, with LinkedIn tumbling to its worst one-day performance..
abstract: Stocks fall sharply, ending week with big declines; tech shares are volatile.
lead_paragraph: Employers added 151,000 jobs in January, a sharp slowdown. Technology stocks fell hard, with LinkedIn tumbling to its worst one-day performance..

headline.main: Volatility in Tech Shares Drags Market Lower
headline.print_headline: Volatility in Tech Shares Drags Market Lower
